frame.name: Desiring
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> desires that an <fen>Event</fen> occur. (Note that commonly a resultant state of the <fen>Event</fen> will stand in for the <fen>Event</fen>.) In some cases, the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is an active participant in the <fen>Event</fen>, and in such cases the <fen>Event</fen> itself is often not mentioned, but rather some <fen>Focal_participant</fen> which is subordinately involved in the <fen>Event</fen>. <ex></ex>Generally, the use of a word in this frame implies that the specific <fen>Event</fen> has not yet happened, but that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> believes that they would be happier if it did. Sometimes the <fen>Time_of_event</fen>, <fen>Purpose_of_event</fen>, or the <fen>Location_of_event</fen> are mentioned without the explicit mention of the <fen>Event</fen>. <ex><fex name="Experiencer">I</fex> only <t>wanted</t> <fex name="Foc">one piece of candy</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Exp">The company</fex> <m>was</m> <t>eager</t> <fex name="Foc">for him</fex> <fex name="Event">to leave as soon as possible</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Exp">Susan</fex> <fex name="Degr">really</fex> <t>wishes</t> <fex name="Event">that you 'd listen to her</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person (or sentient being) who wishes for the <fen>Event</fen> to occur.</def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The change that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> would like to see.</def-root>

FE.name: Focal_participant
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the entity that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> wishes to be affected by some <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> is a the extent of the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s Desiring.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> desires something.
<ex>I <t>wanted</t> more of her <fex name="Manner">like a junkie wants his next fix</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>An aspect of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> that causes a desire. <ex>Do Italians have a <fex name="Explanation">genetic</fex> <t>yearning</t> for pizza?</ex> <ex><fex name="Explanation">Intellectually</fex> he <t>longed</t> for success, but really he just wanted love.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose_of_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Purpose_of_event</fen> is the purpose pertaining to the desired <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>I <t>want</t> that book <fex name="Purp">for my test tomorrow</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_event
FE.definition: <def-root>The time that the <fen>Event</fen> would ideally occur. <ex>I <t>want</t> porridge <fex name="EvT">tomorrow</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location_of_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Location_of_event</fen> is the place involved in the desired <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>I <t>want</t> that box <fex name="PEv">on top of the other one</fex>.</ex> <ex>The prince <t>wishes</t> you <fex name="PEv">here</fex> before matins.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> desires something. <ex>Oh, so <fex name="Time">now</fex> you <t>want</t> to go to the zoo!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>Where the event takes place. Note that this FE is of extremely rare occurrence in this frame. <ex><fex name="Place">In the car</fex> I had <t>desired</t> nothing more than to get here, but now that I'm here...</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has desired something. <ex>His <fex name="Dur">lifelong</fex> <t>yearning</t> for success had finally been fulfilled.</ex> <ex>I've <t>wanted</t> them to fix the sidewalk <fex name="Dur">for years</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role_of_focal_participant
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Role is a role filled by a Focal_participant in the Event that the Experiencer desires.
<ex>Michaels originally <t>wanted</t> Smith <fex name="rol">as the new Late Night producer</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: want.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have a desire to possess or do (something); wish for

lexUnit.name: desire.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: strongly wish for or want, want sexually.

lexUnit.name: desire.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong feeling of wanting to have something or wishing for something to happen, strong sexual feeling or appetite.

lexUnit.name: desirous.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: wishing (for)

lexUnit.name: lust.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a passionate desire for something.

lexUnit.name: lust.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: feel lust for someone or something.

lexUnit.name: hunger.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have a strong desire for.

lexUnit.name: hunger.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong desire.

lexUnit.name: hungry.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having a strong desire.

lexUnit.name: thirst.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong desire for.

lexUnit.name: thirst.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have a strong desire for.

lexUnit.name: thirsty.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: eager to obtain.

lexUnit.name: long.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have a strong wish for or to do.

lexUnit.name: longing.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a (wistful) feeling of desire.

lexUnit.name: urge.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong desire or impulse.

lexUnit.name: aspire.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: direct one's hopes or ambitions towards achieving something.

lexUnit.name: wish.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a desire or hope, or an expression of this.

lexUnit.name: wish (that).v
lexUnit.definition: COD: desire something that cannot or probably will not happen.

lexUnit.name: eager.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: strongly wanting to do or have.

lexUnit.name: hanker.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: feel a strong desire for or to do something

lexUnit.name: hankering.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a strong desire

lexUnit.name: aspiration.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a hope or ambition.

lexUnit.name: crave.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: feel a powerful desire for.

lexUnit.name: craving.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a strong urge (to consume something)

lexUnit.name: yearn.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have an intense feeling of loss and longing for something.

lexUnit.name: yen.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a longing or yearning.

lexUnit.name: yearning.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an intense and painful desire.

lexUnit.name: wants.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a desire for something.

lexUnit.name: hope.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: expect and desire.

lexUnit.name: hope.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a feeling of expectation and desire.

lexUnit.name: covet.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: yearn to possess

lexUnit.name: covetous.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: yearning to possess (something belonging to someone else)

lexUnit.name: will.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: intend or desire to happen.

lexUnit.name: wish.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: desire something that cannot or probably will not happen.

lexUnit.name: yen.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: feel a longing or yearning.

lexUnit.name: ambition.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the hope of accompllishing some goal, often over a long time, and involving considerable effort.

lexUnit.name: feel like.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to feel a desire for

lexUnit.name: interested.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having a desire for someone or something

lexUnit.name: in the hope of.prep
lexUnit.definition: FN: with the desire to

lexUnit.name: raring.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: very eager to do someting

lexUnit.name: spoiling.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: be extremely or aggressively eager for.

lexUnit.name: dying.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: extremely desirous

lexUnit.name: fancy.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: feel a desire for

lexUnit.name: pine.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: miss and long for the return of.

lexUnit.name: ache.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: yearn.

lexUnit.name: desired.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: being desired

lexUnit.name: will.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a desire or intention.

lexUnit.name: itch.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: crave in a restless manner

lexUnit.name: loath.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: specifically not wanting (to do something), despite contextual reasons in favor, because of the anticipated outcome.

lexUnit.name: reluctant.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having a desire not (to do something)

lexUnit.name: care.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: want. [NB: negative polarity and conditionals.]

lexUnit.name: in hopes of.prep
lexUnit.definition: FN: with the desire to

lexUnit.name: impulse.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a sudden desire or whim
